Content.Text:
<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Uuugh... So sleepy...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Ah, <MYNAME>! What are you doing here?
Have you come to visit me?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wha...?! You want to take me on a date?! Yeah,
that sounds great, but I've got an appointment in
an hour...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So as long as you don't mind it being a very
short date, I'm okay with hanging out for a
little...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sorry, <MYNAME>. I'm so exhausted, my head
is spinning right now...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Work's been really busy lately. Haven't had much
time to rest. Mind if I take a nap real quick?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Thanks. I appreciate it. Wake me up in 30
minutes, 'kay?

It's been 30 minutes, but he looks like he's
sleeping really soundly.
<PAGE>
He was really tired, too. I almost can't bring
myself to wake him up...
Wake him up.
Wait for him to wake up.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Mph...Has it been 30 minutes already...?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm feeling a little better now. Sorry about that.
You must've been pretty bored just waiting
around for me to wake up.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Huh? You watched me while I slept?! D-don't do
that! There's nothing interesting about watching
me sleep! That's creepy!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Sheesh. You're weird. But, ah well! I've got a
little time, so how about we go get ourselves a
snack?
<PAGE>
My treat, since you did me the favor of waking
me up. We can talk some more while we eat.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Don't be shy.
<PAGE>
I'm glad you're worried for me and all, but I do
feel better after having that nap. No reason to go
back home.
<PAGE>
Besides, like I said, I've got a little time until my
appointment.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>C'mon, quit being so dense! I'm trying to say I
don't want you to leave yet.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I really didn't have the time and wasn't feeling
up to it, I would've just come right out and said
it.
<PAGE>
I'd've gone home and slept for real, instead of
taking a little 30-minute power nap.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I didn't, because I want to spend time with
you!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Got it? Good. Now hurry up and make your
order!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Nnnh...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? What time is it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Whoa! It's been over an hour?!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, why didn't you wake me?!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh...you were worried for me, huh? Ah well. I
guess it's my fault for going to sleep in the first
place. But now I'm late!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Sorry. I've really got to get going. I'll make it up
to you later, though, I promise! See ya.
